remarks: A sublattice condition that transfers the modular pair property. Exercise 12 of [Kalmbach] p. 103.  Also Lemma 1.5.3 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: mdsl0 $p |- ( ( ( A e. CH /\ B e. CH ) /\ ( C e. CH /\ D e. CH ) ) -> ( ( ( ( C C_ A /\ D C_ B ) /\ ( A i^i B ) = 0H ) /\ A MH B ) -> C MH D ) ) $.
